data.title: Living Room Furniture
data.meta_description: Shop the extensive range of top-quality living room furniture at Glasswells to complete your living space and add that 'wow-factor' to your home.
data.text:
The Acton Dining Chair will add a touch of contemporary sophistication to any interior. Featuring a greige whitewood high-gloss frame with an ecoleather seat and back, the Acton Dining Chair brings style to your dining room without compromising comfort.
